name: CityPups Dog Adoption App Design & Portfolio Template (2021)
description:
Everything you need to design an amazing dog adoption app, and a sweeeet portfolio project to show off your work!


These templates are designed to be used in the Bitesize UX workshop, Design The CityPups Dog Adoption App.


Want to build your UX skills, experience, and portfolio in just a few hours?


Check out this workshop, and dozens of others at BitesizeUX.com! All of our workshops are beginner friendly, hands-on, and FUN.


Join our community of friendly designers who are makin' moves!
